pr_title: Partly fix release 1.9 disabled gradle test

timeline.author: ia3andy

replies.bodyText: The variable is never used. And as this is a get, I think doesn't do anything. Right?
replies.author: glefloch

replies.bodyText: It checks that the projectDefinition contains a codestart of type CodestartType.PROJECT, you can remove the variable though :)
replies.author: ia3andy

replies.bodyText: oh ok, I will reintroduce that line without the variable then :)

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason why you moved the line? I think we should keep it at the place it was before.

replies.bodyText: That's a mistake, when reverting this, I pasted the line at the wrong place. I moved it back to its original place.
